desc.name: Increased meetup participation of active members by 10%
Mentored members in fundamentals of HTML5, CSS3 and JavascriptES6.
Monitored the group social media and online presence for our online community.
Collaborated with team members to develop communication and information for upcoming meetings.
Responsible for troubleshooting hardware and software equipment and machinery components.
Completed repairs, performed preventative maintenance and kept records in quality system.
Identified and resolved complex problems that impact project direction.
Communicated across departments regarding equipment status, issues and resolutions.
